text: Hey, i'm the Warrior around here.

choices.choice: I want to be a Warrior.

dialog.text: Hah ! You think you have the guts to become a true Warrior ?! I can show you a few things, but you'll have to prove your worth, prove that you can follow our path.
All right, I want you to kill Rabbits, we have too much of them around here. Come back only when you have enough blood on your hands.
Hah ! That's not good enough ! Are those cute rabbits scaring you ?! Come back with more blood on your hands !
Hmm, thay will be enough. Maybe you can handle our path after all.
Go now, don't let anyone overcome you.
